Description: kind of layer into RB or Mobility Servers. Layer ontology describes data domain Reactive Box and other elements of this entity
Unique id of USER into system
Representation of geo-point of current position of event
Unique id of application into system
If this device in the current event is joined to another system (such bus for example) - must be appears the name of system on this format: NAMELAYER.idsystem
Data transfered from the device (usually in json format)
